title: Comparison is the thief of joy

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
I like to think 
 I'm the one in charge
panels.hovertext: probably doesn't even know the words

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
I've never heard a sad song 
 sung by a horse
panels.hovertext: probably doesn't even know the words
